h2_title: Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: After he crashes into the skull pile, the armored bug boss will waste no time lunging through the air at you, and then launch into one of its more common attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
After he crashes into the skull pile, the armored bug boss will waste no time lunging through the air at you, and then launch into one of its more common attacks.
